author: rineholt
msg: Have TestElementSample use localhost so it matches the WSDL generated by wsdl?
Allow wsdl? feature to be able to target another host/port so one can target
proxies like tcpmon which is helpful to see the actual WSDL generated.

author: jmsnell
msg: Removed the V2DD and WSML code.  This was never finished, never used, and never a priority.

author: tomj
msg: Fix the broken fix I submitted which sets the hostname used for
WSDL locations.  Can't seem to get the ip address and/or hostname
that I need so put back the hardwired 'localhost'.  This is broken, but
for what we use SimpleAxisServer for, it is sufficient.
